name: Moon Invaders (Hannah Perrott)
description:
Made in Unreal Engine 5, made as a college project for my final major project module.

Set on the Moon, you can play as either astronauts and aliens.

It's a third-person shooter where you must capture control points and shoot the opposing team members.

Your goal is to destroy the enemy team's reactor before they do the same or score more points then the other team before the timer runs out.

Keep your oxygen up by collecting dropped oxygen tanks from players or staying close to ally control points.
